text: When providing a response for each statement, please focus on the past 3 months

I was told more than once that I spend too much time ______ online.

Please complete the above statement with each of the options below, and choose one individual response per option that best describes how strongly each matches your own experience:

I feel uneasy once I stop going online with the purpose of ______ for a certain period of time.

Please complete the above statement with each of the options below, and choose one individual response per option that best describes how strongly each matches your own experience:

I find that I have been spending longer and longer periods of time ______ online.

Please complete the above statement with each of the options below, and choose one individual response per option that best describes how strongly each matches your own experience:

I feel restless and irritable when I am unable to go online with the purpose of ______ because the Internet is disconnected or unavailable.

Please complete the above statement with each of the options below, and choose one individual response per option that best describes how strongly each matches your own experience:

I feel energized when I am online ______.

Please complete the above statement with each of the options below, and choose one individual response per option that best describes how strongly each matches your own experience:

I stay online ______ for longer periods of time than intended

Please complete the above statement with each of the options below, and choose one individual response per option that best describes how strongly each matches your own experience:

Although using the Internet with the purpose of ______ has negatively affected my relationships, the amount of time I spend online has not decreased.

Please complete the above statement with each of the options below, and choose one individual response per option that best describes how strongly each matches your own experience:

More than once, I have slept less than four hours when I have been online ______. .

I fail to control the impulse to go online when it involves ______.

I find myself online ______ instead of spending time with friends.

Please complete the above statement with each of the options below, and choose one individual response per option that best describes how strongly each matches your own experience:

I get backaches or other physical discomfort from spending time online ______.

Please fill in the blank by choosing one response that best describes how strongly each item applies to you:

Going online for _____ is the first thought I have when I wake up each morning.

Please complete the above statement with each of the options below, and choose one individual response per option that best describes how strongly each matches your own experience:
